mapper.sql: a.dbid AS "dbid", a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.leaderId AS "leader.id", a.organizationId AS "organization.id", a.createby AS "createBy.id", a.createdate AS "createDate", a.updateby AS "updateBy.id", a.updatedate AS "updateDate", a.delFlag AS "delFlag"
, u.name AS "leader.name", o.name AS "organization.name", o.supervisorId AS "organization.supervisor.id", p.name AS "organization.supervisor.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = a.leaderId LEFT JOIN t_mis_dunning_organization o on o.id = a.organizationId LEFT JOIN t_mis_dunning_people p on p.id = o.supervisorId
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM sys_user u WHERE u.del_flag = 0
SELECT a.id AS "id" FROM t_mis_dunning_group a WHERE a.delflag = '0' AND a.LeaderId = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mis_dunning_group( id, name, type, leaderId, createby, createdate, updateby, updatedate, delFlag, organizationId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{leader.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{organization.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_mis_dunning_group SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, leaderId = #{leader.id}, organizationId = #{organization.id}, updateby = #{updateBy.id}, updatedate = #{updateDate}, delFlag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct g.id FROM t_mis_dunning_group g LEFT JOIN t_mis_dunning_organization o ON g.organizationId = o.id WHERE o.supervisorId = #{supervisor.id} AND g.delflag = '0' AND o.delflag = '0'
